title: What Taylor Swift song is the most meaningful to you? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Haunted” with the bells on stage then “Back to December” on YouTube these songs released grief that was trapped in me for at least 20 years. I cried. I roared for at least 2 hours. Some neighbors checked on me others threatened to call the police. I was hoarse for a few days and now am feeling better, than in at least 20 years. Thank you 🙏
Based on the Taylor Swift songs I’ve heard, the only meaning I get is that she really hates her ex boyfriends.
